metadata.title: CVE-2023-52801 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iommufd: Fix missing update of domains_itree after splitting iopt_areaIn iopt_area_split(), if the original iopt_area has filled a domain and islinked to domains_itree, pages_nodes have to be properlyreinserted. Otherwise the domains_itree becomes corrupted and we will UAF.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
